name: CategoryTheory.Limits.instHasFilteredColimitsOfSizeFunctor
initialProofState:
C : Type u₁
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} C
K : Type u₂
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₂, u₂} K
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFilteredColimitsOfSize.{w', w, v₁, u₁} C
⊢ CategoryTheory.Limits.HasFilteredColimitsOfSize.{w', w, max u₂ v₁, max (max (max u₁ u₂) v₁) v₂} (CategoryTheory.Functor K C)
decl:
instance [HasFilteredColimitsOfSize.{w', w} C] : HasFilteredColimitsOfSize.{w', w} (K ⥤ C) :=
  ⟨fun _ => inferInstance⟩
